tool_description: Analyzes route characteristics including path length, complexity, and network properties between origin and destination points.

network_id.description: Network identifier from Road Network Loader

analysis_depth.description: Analysis depth level: basic, detailed, comprehensive

error_messages: Network not found: Specified network_id does not exist or was not properly loaded
Invalid coordinates: Origin and destination coordinates must be valid latitude/longitude values
Points outside network: Origin or destination points are outside the loaded network boundaries
Unsupported analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive]
Route not found: No valid route exists between origin and destination points
usage: Provide network_id and origin/destination coordinates, optionally specify analysis_depth. Returns comprehensive route characteristics and properties.

number_of_turns.description: Total number of turns along the route

road_types_used.description: Types of roads used in the route

straight_line_distance.description: Direct distance between origin and destination in kilometers
